```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
data(mtcars)
mtcars<-within(mtcars,{am<-factor(am,labels=c("automatico","manual"))})

mtcars<-within(mtcars,{vs<-factor(vs,labels=c("não","sim"))})
```

### Chart J

```{r}

 library(dygraphs)
library(data.table)

z <- rbind(
  data.table(t=as.POSIXlt("2015-07-01 09:30:00") + 0:359, y = cumsum(rnorm(360))),
  data.table(t=as.POSIXlt("2015-07-01 11:30:00") + 0:359, y = cumsum(rnorm(360))))
setkey(z, t)
z[, t := as.Date("2015-07-01") + seq_along(y)]
dygraph(z)
```
